titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for suppressing of false rumours touching Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... VVhite-Hall, this seuen and twentieth day of March, in the fifth yeere of our reigne ...
Arms 12; Steele notation: of the 2) the this.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
